home.welcomeDescription: We are glad you are here! We are ready to help you in any matter. Do you need a quick answer or detailed information? Nothing simpler! Click the button below and take advantage of the opportunity to contact us. We are here for you!
home.dontHaveAccountDescription: No problem! You can continue without registration, but we strongly encourage you to create a free account. This way you will discover additional features, such as the ability to view call history and customize settings to your needs!
home.thanksForLoggingIn: Thank you for logging into the system!
home.thanksForLogginInDescription: We wish you a nice day and successful conversations! Don't forget to visit the settings tab to customize the system to your needs!
home.beFirst2: person who ordered a conversation with us today!

answered.greetings: Thank you for using our services! We sincerely hope that the conversation met your expectations!

callUsModal.badNumber: An invalid phone number has been selected!
callUsModal.busy: Unfortunately, the number you are calling is busy!
callUsModal.failed: Unfortunately, the connection could not be established!
callUsModal.noAnswer: Unfortunately, the number you are calling does not answer!
callUsModal.ringing: The connection with the consultant will be made shortly

userSettings.title: User settings
userSettings.doYouWantToDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
